bannerText:
Beginning in the late 70's, a series of rather, er, loose improvisations took place. Initially, these were perpetrated by Ray Nering and myself. Frank Romond and Lee Walsh would ultimately become complicit as well.

Early on, Ray termed these sessions Gas Music from Jupiter (from the Firesign Theatre album Everything You Know is Wrong). Gas Music gatherings were a thing throughout the 80's. The result was some 20 sessions. An attempt will be made to document as many as possible.
